bioAsHtml: My name is Christophe THEPAUT, "Software Architect - Development and Quality Officer for Connexis Cash" at BNP Paribas Corporate & Investment Banking. I am a techie interested in all the tools and reusable patterns allowing me to achieve efficient design and software quality to best serve my customers, my managers and my teamates. I beleive in pragmatic technical inovation because I'm convinced that inovation must benefits to us all, not just the geek I tend to be.

acceptedTalks.title: Cloudifie ton monolithe : les  microservices pour une  architecture comme les grands du web

bio: My name is Christophe THEPAUT, "Software Architect - Development and Quality Officer for Connexis Cash" at BNP Paribas Corporate & Investment Banking. I am a techie interested in all the tools and reusable patterns allowing me to achieve efficient design and software quality to best serve my customers, my managers and my teamates. I beleive in pragmatic technical inovation because I'm convinced that inovation must benefits to us all, not just the geek I tend to be.
